column2: each time we have wanted BBQ from Smoque they have been out of of at LEAST two menu items (and they really only have four) and in one instance
column3: had stopped taking phone orders all together! The food seems to have suffered a little too. I wonder if they are having a hard time cooking in the quantities they need to now. There is also an apparently constant line almost out the door for ordering
column4: and while it moves pretty well
column5: it is still a long irritating line.
